node.title: Australia lists neo-Nazi organisation The Base as terrorist organisation
node.description: Global white supremacist group The Base, as well as the Lebanese Shia political party Hezbollah, will beÂ listed as terrorist organisations, making it illegal to be a member.
node.content: ["Australia has listed\u00a0white supremacist group The Base as a terrorist organisation, making it a criminal offence to be a member.", "Home Affairs Minister Karen Andrews described The Base as \"a violent, racist and neo-Nazi organisation\"\u00a0known to be planning attacks in several nations.", "The entirety of Hezbollah \u2014\u00a0a Shia Islamist militant group based in Lebanon but active abroad \u2014\u00a0will also be listed as a terrorist organisation. \u00a0", "Earlier this year, the ABC revealed\u00a0The Base was actively targeting\u00a0men as young as 17 for recruitment\u00a0in Australia.", "The far-right group was already designated a terrorist organisation in Canada and the United Kingdom.", "Australia's domestic intelligence agency, ASIO, has warned right-wing extremists such as members of The Base now account for one-third of its investigations.", "Senator Andrews said Australia's terror threat would remain \"probable\"\u00a0but indicated an attack would become more likely as the nation's\u00a0borders opened.", "\"That means that we\u00a0have credible intelligence that\u00a0there are individuals with the\u00a0capability and the intent to conduct\u00a0a terrorist attack here in\u00a0Australia,\" Senator Andrews said.", "The government's bipartisan committee on intelligence and security has also recommended the entirety of Palestinian group Hamas be listed as a terror organisation.", "More to come."]
